eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Jackson, MS; AT 01:01 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:16 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: 911 service is currently down. To contact the JCSO, call 2287693065. To contact Acadian Ambulance, call 4695196577.
